Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-47755 affecting package kernel for versions less than 5.15.167.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-47755 affecting package kernel for versions less than 5.15.167.1-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.
